items.title: Figma
items.subtitle: A vector graphics editor and prototyping tool which is primarily web-based

items.title: Affinity Designer
items.subtitle: Vector graphics tool designed to help graphic designers, web designers, game developers, and professional illustrators create UI/UX designs, typography, icons, and concept art

items.title: Affinity Photo
items.subtitle: Image editing tool that provides features including panorama stitching, HDR merge, focus stacking, PSD editing and more

items.title: Scalable Vector Graphics
items.subtitle: An XML based markup that can contain two-dimensional vectors

items.title: Google Material Design
items.subtitle: A design language developed by Google in 2014
